mention.text: Terry Anderson , the longest-held of the Western hostages in Lebanon
the longest-held of the Western hostages in Lebanon
Anderson , chief Middle East correspondent for the Associated Press

Terry Anderson captors came to Terry Anderson cell Tuesday afternoon with new clothes -- the first new apparel Terry Anderson had worn in almost seven years -- and a pair of new shoes that were pinching Terry Anderson feet

the ninth Western hostage to be freed since August Terry Anderson release came after months of negotiations led by a special U.N. envoy , Giandomenico Picco , who dealt with Iranians , Israelis and the Lebanese kidnappers
the sister who campaigned tirelessly for his release Peggy Say dashed forward and gave her brother a huge hug
the other two American hostages freed this week
Iranians , Israelis and the Lebanese kidnappers
Iranians , Israelis and the Lebanese kidnappers
an honor William Higgins 'd have gladly given up long ago
only one of the styles to confront The war is going on
the hostage in the statement time
